remarks: The cardinality of a set with an equivalence relation is the sum of the cardinalities of its equivalence classes.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jan-2015.)
statement:
qshash.1 $e |- ( ph -> .~ Er A ) $.
qshash.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
qshash $p |- ( ph -> ( # ` A ) = sum_ x e. ( A /. .~ ) ( # ` x ) ) $.
$d .~ x $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
